name: Liveagent quickstart
description: A quickstart app to spin up a site with a Liveagent chat button

DEPLOYMENT_URL.description: The URL to the deployment.js file

CHAT_URL.description: The URL to the chat service

CHAT_KEY_ONE.description: The first key for the chat init call

CHAT_KEY_TWO.description: The second key for the chat init call

CHAT_KEY_BUTTON.description: The key for the chat button
